definitions.definition: One who takes part in apple bobbing .
A buoyant device (frequently made of cork or hollow plastic) attached to a line so as to suspend the end of the line with the hook (and bait or lure ) above the bottom.
A style of custom motorcycle with stripped-down bodywork and a shortened (or "bobbed") rear fender .
A person who rides a bobsleigh ; a bobsleigher .
One who has a bob hairstyle .

main_definition: One who takes part in apple bobbing .
secondary_definitions: ( fishing ) A buoyant device (frequently made of cork or hollow plastic) attached to a line so as to suspend the end of the line with the hook (and bait or lure ) above the bottom.
A style of custom motorcycle with stripped-down bodywork and a shortened (or "bobbed") rear fender .
A person who rides a bobsleigh ; a bobsleigher .
One who has a bob hairstyle .
